code:
flowchart TD
  Q[User question] --> R{Command?}
  R -->|Yes| C[Command handler add assign mark]
  C --> DB[(Session DB)]
  DB --> A[Assistant reply]

  R -->|No| P[Context builder summary excerpts history]
  P --> LLM[LLM Chat Agent GPT 5 2]
  LLM --> A

  A --> S[Store in session chat]
  S --> DB

  G[Guardrails session only context fallback if LLM fails] --> LLM
  G --> C
repo_description: Live transcription → speaker/role attribution → commitment graph → follow-through autopilot.
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
